Name: STM-45 Gen.2 .45 carbine (a)
Description: A PCC carbine with excellent performance already "out of the box", manufactured by Soyuz-TM Arms. Designed with the participation of world bronze medalist in Semi-Auto Rifle Vadim Mikhailov. Accuracy, speed, comfort of recoil. Compatible with Glock .45 magazines. Modified to shoot in fully automatic fire and shoots slightly slower.
